summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3209, for the improvement of the alley in block 12, University Park Addition, being the alley between 18th Avenue Northeast and 19th Avenue Northeast, from East 47th Street to East 50th Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 39662 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
